findings.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm; minimal calcium burden.
findings.lower_chest: Minimal atelectasis in the lung bases; no pleural or pericardial effusion.

abdomen.hepatobiliary: Liver homogenous attenuation; no focal lesions or biliary dilatation; gallbladder normal.
abdomen.urinary: Normal kidney size; no stones or hydronephrosis; scattered simple cysts.
abdomen.gastrointestinal: Appendix enlarged with hyperenhancing wall (13 mm diameter) and adjacent fat stranding; no free air or fluid collection.
abdomen.pelvis: Bladder and ureters unremarkable; no pelvic fluid or lymphadenopathy.
abdomen.bones: No worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
